answerText: Diophantine equation[10] This theorem states that the Diophantine equation a to the n plus b to the n equal c to the n has no solution for n greater than two. It was proven by Andrew Wiles.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 13 | 4 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The enumeration of an algorithm to solve an arbitrary equation of this type was the subject of Hilbert's tenth problem. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of equation to which the solutions are all be integers.
